lead_paragraph: U.S. Olympic gold medalist Kayla Harrison is eager to compete in front of Brazil's passionate judo fans and hopes to meet long-time Brazilian rival Mayra Aguiar in the final at the Rio Games, calling it "destiny."
snippet: U.S. Olympic gold medalist Kayla Harrison is eager to compete in front of Brazil's passionate judo fans and hopes to meet long-time Brazilian rival Mayra Aguiar in the final at the Rio Games, calling it "destiny."...
